meanings.sent1: The inchoative phase of the project was exciting.

meanings.definition: Showing the beginning of an action or state
meanings.sent1: His inchoative steps towards change were evident.
meanings.sent2: The inchoative signs of spring brought hope to all.
meanings.sent3: The inchoative dance moves made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The inchoative melody of the song captured their hearts.
meanings.sent5: The inchoative colors of the painting hinted at a deeper story.

meanings.sent3: The inchoative habit of arriving early became his trademark.
meanings.sent4: The inchoative energy of the crowd was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The inchoative whispers of change filled the air with anticipation.
